title: xdebug配置参数
zzzContent:
zend_extension = "/home/y/lib/php/20020429/xdebug.so"

; xdebug.auto_trace = "0"
; xdebug.trace_output_dir = "/tmp"
; xdebug.trace_output_name = "crc32"
; xdebug.collect_params = "0"
; xdebug.collect_includes = "1"
; xdebug.default_enable = "1"
; xdebug.extended_info = "1"
; xdebug.manual_url = "http://www.php.net"
; xdebug.max_nesting_level = "64"
; xdebug.max_nesting_level = "64"
; xdebug.show_local_vars = "0"
; xdebug.show_mem_delta = "0"
; xdebug.dump.COOKIE = NULL
; xdebug.dump.ENV = NULL
; xdebug.dump.FILES = NULL
; xdebug.dump.GET = NULL
; xdebug.dump.POST = NULL
; xdebug.dump.REQUEST = NULL
; xdebug.dump.SERVER = NULL
; xdebug.dump.SESSION = NULL
; xdebug.dump_globals = "1"
; xdebug.dump_once = "1"
; xdebug.dump_undefined = "0"
; xdebug.profiler_enable = "0"
; xdebug.profiler_output_dir = "/tmp"
; xdebug.profiler_output_name = "crc32"
;; Uncomment the following 5 lines to enable remote debugging with Komodo3
; xdebug.remote_enable = "1"
; xdebug.remote_handler = "dbgp"
; xdebug.remote_host = "<your_client_box>.corp.yahoo.com"
; xdebug.remote_mode = "req"
; xdebug.allowed_clients = ""
